command.script:
#!/bin/bash set -eu [[ $# != 3 ]] && { echo >&2 'usage: $0 repository release pkg1,pkg2,pkgN' exit 2 } REPOSITORY=$1 RELEASE=$2 PACKAGELIST=$3
echo "# PROMOTE" echo "## $REPOSITORY/$RELEASE" echo "## Promote $REPOSITORY/$RELEASE..."
PACKAGES=( ${PACKAGELIST//,/ } ) echo "number packages: ${#PACKAGES[*]}" echo for package in ${PACKAGES[*]:-} do echo "- $REPOSITORY/$RELEASE/$package" done
exit $?

job.description: promote the packages to the ops repository.
job.name: Promote
